citing_paper_authors: David, Martinez | Eneko, Agirre
raw_text: Since the papers were published, word sense disambiguation has moved to deal with fine grained sense distinctions from widely recognized semantic lexical resources; ontologies like Sensus, Cyc, EDR, WordNet, EuroWordNet, etc. or machine-readable dictionaries like OALDC, Webster ' s, LDOCE, etc. This is due, in part, to the availability of public hand-tagged material ,e.g. SemCor (Miller et al, 1993) and the DSO collection (Ng& amp; Lee, 1996)
clean_text: This is due, in part, to the availability of public hand-tagged material, e.g. SemCor (Miller et al, 1993) and the DSO collection (Ng & Lee, 1996).
